select t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.type, t.content, t.amount, t.reason, t.remarks, t.modifier_name, t.MODIFIED_TIME, t.choice, t.execute_date, t.staff_id, CONCAT(t.modifier_name, " 于 " ,t.MODIFIED_TIME," 更新") updateDesc from ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, dic.label type, f.content, f.amount, f.reason, f.remarks, usr.USER_NAME modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME, CASE WHEN f.choice = 1 THEN '奖励' WHEN f.choice =2 THEN '惩罚' END choice, f.execute_date, f.staff_id FROM mp_staff_rewards_pulishments f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dic on dic.`value`=f.type and dic.type='YGJCLB' LEFT JOIN mp_user usr on usr.id=f.MODIFIER_CODE where f.del_flag=0 order by f.CREATED_TIME desc )t where 1=1
and CONCAT( IFNULL(t.staff_name,'') ,IFNULL(t.staff_code,'') ,IFNULL(t.type,'') ,IFNULL(t.content,'') , IFNULL(t.amount,'') ,IFNULL( t.reason,''),IFNULL( t.remarks,'') ,IFNULL(t.modifier_name,'') , IFNULL(t.MODIFIED_TIME,''), IFNULL(t.choice,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
